description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It includes template markup and state management for toggling favorite status.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A Lightning Component representing a button with toggleable 'favorited' state.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Event handler for the 'enter' input, toggling the 'isFavorited' state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Returns the initial state object for the component.
